content.raw:
To test out the `integrators` example, the easiest way to run it is with the `-a` flag, which tells it to use all the native plugins that get shipped with the example.

It's entirely possible (and even encouraged) to create your own numerical integration or DiffEQ plugin library and pass it to the `integrators` program as a command line argument.
content.html:
To test out the integrators example, the easiest way to run it is with the -a flag, which tells it to use all the native plugins that get shipped with the example.

It's entirely possible (and even encouraged) to create your own numerical integration or DiffEQ plugin library and pass it to the integrators program as a command line argument.
